definition: don't!/must not
(negative prefix)/not/no
to demand/to request/to coerce
important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if
unimportant/not serious/it doesn't matter/never mind/it looks all right, but
to have no sense of shame/shameless
to know no shame/to be totally shameless
don't insist on only taking one road to Rome (idiom)/there's more than one way to skin a cat
pinyin: bu4 yao4 zai4 yi1 ke1 shu4 shang4 diao4 si3

sentences.english: You must prevent the children from touching the dangerous things.
sentences.chinese: 你们务必不要让孩子接触危险物品。

sentences.english: Feel the body relax, feel the tenseness disappear, but do not fall asleep.
sentences.chinese: 感觉身体放松，感觉绷紧消失，但是不要睡着。

sentences.english: B:Here they are, will you weigh all our luggage together?
sentences.chinese: 这些都是，要不要把我的全部行李一起过磅？

sentences.english: Also write down the time of day and the time of year.
sentences.chinese: 也不要忘了记下年月日和时刻。

sentences.english: Fourth, solve problems through consultation on an equal footing, instead of imposing restriction at will.
sentences.chinese: 通过平等协商解决问题，不要动辄设限和制裁。

sentences.english: Do not pressurize or expose to open flame or heat.
sentences.chinese: 不要给空容器加压，不要放在明火或热源附近。

sentences.english: Do not pressurize or expose to open flame or heat.
sentences.chinese: 不要给空容器加压，不要放在明火或热源附近。

sentences.english: Don't speak in such abstract terms.
sentences.chinese: 不要这样抽象地谈问题。

sentences.english: Don't bet on winning the game.
sentences.chinese: 不要以为能侥幸赢得比赛。

sentences.english: Don't do this on an old, slow machine.
sentences.chinese: 不要在速度慢的旧机器上这么做。

sentences.english: Dreyman: I specifically said no books.
sentences.chinese: 特定的我提醒过不要书。

sentences.english: If you have handouts, do not read straight from them.
sentences.chinese: 如果你准备了讲义，不要完全照着读。

sentences.english: Don’t be tempted to leave any of the purchase on the counters.
sentences.chinese: 不要试图把买回来的东西放在台子上。

sentences.english: Don't take it to heart. They are just babes and sucklings.
sentences.chinese: 不要放在心上，那些只是些乳臭未干的小子。

sentences.english: Don't leave the engine to warm up in winter; you're burning petrol unnecessarily.
sentences.chinese: 冬天的时候，不要让引擎空转，这是在不必要地费油。

to avoid as taboo/to avoid by all means
